target.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "control_change")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "key"])

panels.title: Step
panels.description: Current training step for the active run.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "step")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.title: Loss
panels.description:
Training loss (cross-entropy) for the active run.

Sparkline shows loss trajectory Ă˘â‚¬â€ť downward slope = learning, flat = plateau.

Lower is better. Typical range: 0.7 (random) down to <0.1 (mastered).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Accuracy
panels.description:
Bit-level accuracy (bit_acc) for the active run.

Sparkline shows accuracy trajectory Ă˘â‚¬â€ť upward slope = improving, flat = plateau.

50% = random guessing. 100% = perfect prediction.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bit_acc")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Eval Acc
panels.description:
Evaluation accuracy (bit_acc on held-out eval batch).

This is the honest score Ă˘â‚¬â€ť measures generalization, not memorization.
Compare with training Accuracy to spot overfitting (train >> eval = bad).

50% = random guessing. 100% = perfect generalization.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bit_acc")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Byte Match
panels.description:
Byte-level accuracy: ALL 8 bits in a byte must be correct.

This is the strictest accuracy metric. 0% means no bytes fully correct yet.
When this climbs, the model is going from 'close' to 'exact'.

50% = half the bytes perfect. 100% = every byte nailed.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "byte_match")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Stage
panels.description:
Current training stage.
Alpha=Reflex(tt=0) Beta=Recall(tt=1) Gamma=Reason(tt=2) Delta=Depth(tt=4) Epsilon=Emergence(tt=8) Zeta=Zenith(tt=16)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "think_ticks")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.title: Speed
panels.description: Training speed in steps/sec. Sparkline shows speed variation over time.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "s_per_step")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: 1.0 / r._value}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "loss")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.title: Zoom LCX Level Norms
panels.description: Per-level memory activity. L0=base(256), L1=zoom(1024), L2=deep(4096), L3=abyss(16384).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lcx_levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^L\d+_norm$/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.title: Zoom Gate Over Time
panels.description: Learned zoom gate evolution. Rising = model uses deeper levels. Red line = 0.1 early exit threshold.

targets.query:

options.content: L0 â€” 256 slots (16x16) â€” viridis

panels.title: LCX Gradient Flow
panels.description: Gradient norms for LCX routing, write gate, and zoom gate. Log scale Ă˘â‚¬â€ť watch for zeros (dead gradients).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lcx_levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "lcx_route_grad" or r._field == "lcx_write_grad" or r._field == "zoom_gate_grad")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.title: Grad Alive
panels.description: Latest lcx_route_grad value. Green = gradients flowing, Red = dead (zero).

panels.title: Training State

panels.title: LCX Heat Strip (write concentration)
panels.description: Per-level write heat distribution. Top strip: viridis heatmap (dark=cold, yellow=hot, log2 scaled). Bottom strip: valid coverage (green=written, dark=empty).

options.content: Heat: viridis (log2) | Valid: green = written

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "clustering")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "circular_spread")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gate_entropy")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "being_metric")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ctx_scale")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "A#" + r.being_id}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.title: Ant Accuracy  |  Deep Blue=Anti-learned  Cyan=Chance(50%)  Orchid=Learning  Fuchsia=Mastered
panels.description: Per-ant masked accuracy (rolling avg). State-timeline with 13-step Coolors palette.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "being_metric")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "masked_acc")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "A#" + r.being_id}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> movingAverage(n: 5)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value < 0.05 then "Void" else if r._value < 0.12 then "Abyss" else if r._value < 0.22 then "Deep Twilight" else if r._value < 0.32 then "Twilight" else if r._value < 0.42 then "Persian Blue" else if r._value < 0.52 then "Strong Cyan" else if r._value < 0.62 then "Soft Periwinkle" else if r._value < 0.72 then "Orchid Mist" else if r._value < 0.82 then "Vivid Orchid" else if r._value < 0.89 then "Deep Rose" else if r._value < 0.94 then "Rose" else if r._value < 0.98 then "Bright Rose" else "Hot Fuchsia"}))

panels.title: Jump Gates  |  Deep Blue=Walker  Cyan=Balanced  Orchid=Mixed  Fuchsia=Jumper
panels.description: Per-ant jump probability (sigmoid output). State-timeline with 13-step Coolors palette.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "being_metric")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "jump_rate")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "A#" + r.being_id}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> movingAverage(n: 5)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value < 0.05 then "Void" else if r._value < 0.12 then "Abyss" else if r._value < 0.22 then "Deep Twilight" else if r._value < 0.32 then "Twilight" else if r._value < 0.42 then "Persian Blue" else if r._value < 0.52 then "Strong Cyan" else if r._value < 0.62 then "Soft Periwinkle" else if r._value < 0.72 then "Orchid Mist" else if r._value < 0.82 then "Vivid Orchid" else if r._value < 0.89 then "Deep Rose" else if r._value < 0.94 then "Rose" else if r._value < 0.98 then "Bright Rose" else "Hot Fuchsia"}))

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bit_acc")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.is_eval == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bit_oracle")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "being_metric")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "masked_acc")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: "A#" + r.being_id}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> tail(n: 5)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), _value: r._value, _field: r._field}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "being_metric")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "masked_acc")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: "A#" + r.being_id}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), _value: r._value, _field: r._field}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "bit_accuracy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "accuracy")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: "Bit " + r.bit_index}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> tail(n: 5)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), _value: r._value, _field: r._field}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "bit_accuracy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "accuracy")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: "Bit " + r.bit_index}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: now(), _value: r._value, _field: r._field}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

panels.title: Input (avg 50)  |  Twilight=Neg  Periwinkle=Zero  Fuchsia=Pos
panels.description: Latest input frame averaged over last 50 steps. 8x8 spatial grid.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "frame_snapshot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.frame_type == "input")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "C" + r.col, row: "R" + r.row}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["row"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Bit Masks  |  Twilight=Off  Cyan=Assigned
panels.description: Receptive field mask: which ant owns which bit. Same mask for input reading and output writing.

targets.query:
import "strings"

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: -365d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "mask_assignment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "assigned")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "B" + r.bit_index, being: if strings.strlen(v: r.being_id) < 2 then "A#0" + r.being_id else "A#" + r.being_id}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["being"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["being"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

panels.title: Output (avg 50)  |  Twilight=Neg  Periwinkle=Zero  Fuchsia=Pos
panels.description: Latest output frame averaged over last 50 steps. 8x8 spatial grid.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "frame_snapshot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.frame_type == "output")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "C" + r.col, row: "R" + r.row}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["row"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: Memory State (avg 50)  |  Twilight=Neg  Periwinkle=Zero  Fuchsia=Pos
panels.description: Memory state snapshot averaged over last 50 steps. LCX=8x8 matrix, GEM=8 cells expanded to 8x8.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "frame_snapshot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.frame_type == "lcx_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "C" + r.col, row: "R" + r.row}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["row"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: LCX Drift (avg 50)  |  Twilight=Neg  Periwinkle=Zero  Fuchsia=Pos
panels.description: Memory drift from initial state averaged over last 50 steps. Shows how far each cell moved since start.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "frame_snapshot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.frame_type == "lcx_drift")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "C" + r.col, row: "R" + r.row}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["row"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: LCX Delta (50)  |  Twilight=Down  Periwinkle=Still  Fuchsia=Up
panels.description: Net change per memory cell over last 50 steps. Red=moved positive, blue=moved negative, grey=stable.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "frame_snapshot")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.frame_type == "lcx_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> tail(n: 50)
  |> difference()
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "C" + r.col, row: "R" + r.row}))
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["row"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

panels.title: LCX RGB Channel Norms
panels.description: Per-channel LCX norms over time. R=fast effort, G=medium effort, B=slow effort.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lcx_rgb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "r_norm" or r._field == "g_norm" or r._field == "b_norm")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

panels.title: Effort Level
panels.description: Current effort level: 0=FAST(R), 1=MEDIUM(G), 2=SLOW(B)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lcx_rgb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "effort_level")
  |> last()

panels.title: Memory Scratchpad  |  Deep Blue=Negative  Periwinkle=Neutral  Fuchsia=Positive
panels.description: Memory cell values over time (8x8 grid). Coolors palette: Deep Twilight=strongly negative, Soft Periwinkle=near zero, Hot Fuchsia=strongly positive.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lcx_cell")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "R" + r.row + "C" + r.col}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> movingAverage(n: 5)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value < -0.90 then "Void" else if r._value < -0.76 then "Abyss" else if r._value < -0.56 then "Deep Twilight" else if r._value < -0.36 then "Twilight" else if r._value < -0.16 then "Persian Blue" else if r._value < -0.04 then "Strong Cyan" else if r._value < 0.04 then "Soft Periwinkle" else if r._value < 0.16 then "Orchid Mist" else if r._value < 0.36 then "Vivid Orchid" else if r._value < 0.56 then "Deep Rose" else if r._value < 0.76 then "Rose" else if r._value < 0.90 then "Bright Rose" else "Hot Fuchsia"}))

panels.title: Ant-Bit Accuracy  |  Deep Blue=Anti-learned  Cyan=Chance(50%)  Orchid=Learning  Fuchsia=Mastered
panels.description: Per ant-bit prediction accuracy (moving avg 50). Each row = one ant-bit pair. Blue: wrong. Green: 50/50 frontier. Red: correct.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ant_bit_accuracy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "accuracy")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "A" + r.being_id + " B" + r.bit_index}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> movingAverage(n: 5)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r._value < 0.05 then "Void" else if r._value < 0.12 then "Abyss" else if r._value < 0.22 then "Deep Twilight" else if r._value < 0.32 then "Twilight" else if r._value < 0.42 then "Persian Blue" else if r._value < 0.52 then "Strong Cyan" else if r._value < 0.62 then "Soft Periwinkle" else if r._value < 0.72 then "Orchid Mist" else if r._value < 0.82 then "Vivid Orchid" else if r._value < 0.89 then "Deep Rose" else if r._value < 0.94 then "Rose" else if r._value < 0.98 then "Bright Rose" else "Hot Fuchsia"}))

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "control_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.key == "lr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "control_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.key == "think_ticks")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "control_change")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "description")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "key"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "change", key: "control"})

panels.title: Write Heat (10×10)

targets.query:
import "strings"

from(bucket: "diamond")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lcx_levels")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.run_id == "${run_id}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /^L0_rk\d{2}$/)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _value: r._value,
      row: strings.substring(v: r._field, start: 5, end: 6),
      col: "c" + strings.substring(v: r._field, start: 6, end: 7)
  }))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["row"], columnKey: ["col"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["row"])
  |> drop(columns: ["row"])

panels.description: Write frequency per slot (10×10 downsample of 618 slots). Values = log2(writes + 1). Diamond colormap 0–15.

panels.title: Value Norms
panels.description: 25×25 grid of L0 stored value magnitudes (618 slots, 7 empty). Bright = large vector norm. Viridis colormap. Updates each training step via control_panel.py :7777.

panels.title: Key Norms
panels.description: 25×25 grid of L0 stored key magnitudes (618 slots). Bright = large key norm. If hot slots have disproportionately large key norms, retrieval is biased toward them (rich-get-richer). Viridis colormap.
